content: the stitches as much as possible when sewing the head/body seams make sure that you go through both loops on each body part for each stitch practice makes perfect i ve tried pretty much every resource to find the right technique for me believe me i ve come a long way and you will too if you re just starting out face tips put eyes in first don t put the backs on until you re sure that they re even use the eyes to help center the nose and mouth try a few different facial expressions if you re not sure you can pull them out so it s not the end of the world if your new friend looks deranged for a little while ^_^ thank you for trying my pattern i ve used it a few times but if you have any difficulty please don t hesitate to email me bonamimld@gmail com and when you re done with your new friend please send me a picture of the finished fellow i love to see other people s spin on my patterns <3 melissa lynn bonami etsy com and of course all products made from this pattern are for personal use and not for sale the pattern shall not be reproduced and/or distributed without permission of the author 2008 melissa dawson
